version_description:
• Minor improvements.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

If you love Buffer Editor, please leave us positive review on the App Store!

• Minor improvements.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

If you love Buffer Editor, please leave us positive review on the App Store!

• Improvements and fixes for git managers. Now you can add commit message. You might have to reclone the repositories, if you experience any issues.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

If you love Buffer Editor, please leave us positive review on the App Store!

• Minor overall improvements.
• We have also added new fonts and themes. Thanks for the suggestions.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

If you love Buffer Editor, please leave us positive review on the App Store!

• Added Markdown and Fortran syntax.
• Minor overall improvements.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

If you love Buffer Editor, please leave us positive review on the App Store!

• Added support for CTRL+c and CTRL+[ to exit vim mode.
• Added new theme Dracula.
• Minor overall improvements.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

If you love Buffer Editor, please leave us positive review on the App Store!

• You can now use Control or Option to move in document.
Option/Ctrl+D Move half-page down
Option/Ctrl+U Move half-page up
Option/Ctrl+F Move page down
Option/Ctrl+B Move page up

• Added support for .svg files.
• Minor overall improvements.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

• Fixes compatibility issues for older iOS versions. This issue concerns only users with Buffer Editor version 8.0.5 and iOS older than 11.0
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

• Removed "Recent Files" from main screen.
• Fixed scrolling bug when selecting large amount of text.
• Other Minor fixes and improvements.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

• Minor fixes and improvements.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

• Improved FTP library functions.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

• Improved code autocomplete view.
External keyboard:
- Select with up/down arrow.
- Confirm the selection with enter/return or right arrow.
- Cancel with esc or left arrow.
• Fixed Terminal timeout/hang issue in certain cases.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

Buffer Editor 9 is here !

• Selected theme changes also the color for the menu and icons.
• Added dark icon option to the settings.
• Other small fixes and improvements.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

• Some UI theme color changes.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

• Added dark keyboard for terminal. If you use dark themes the terminal keyboard will automatically change to dark. Fixes also layout issue for the terminal keyboard on some devices.
• Some XML syntax highlighting changes.
• If you have any issues or requests, please contact: support@buffereditor.com

• Added progress view for git (clone, pull, push).
• Added SCALA syntax.
• Fixed issue with :colo / :colorscheme commands, now it fully changes the theme for the UI / editor.

Please note:
• We constantly develop the app and proper way to contact us is via support email. We can also give you live support if you have any questions. You can also send us feature requests.
So if you have any issues or requests please contact: support@buffereditor.com

• Added Seti theme.
• Added HAML syntax.
• We constantly develop the app and proper way to contact us is via support email. We can also give you live support if you have any questions. You can also send us feature requests.
So if you have any issues or requests please contact: support@buffereditor.com

• Added "Line spacing/height" to the settings
• Added "Candyland" theme
• Added "reStructedText" syntax
• Improved some syntax themes
• Improved visibility of autocompletion selection

Please note:
• We constantly develop the app and proper way to contact us is via support email. We can also give you live support if you have any questions. You can also send us feature requests.

• Added Vim command "I" (Insert text before the first non-blank in the line).
• Fixed GIT "Pull" issue. After update 9.0.3 "Pull" could break your repo on certain cases and caused crash. Please delete the repository and clone repository again.


Please note:
• We constantly develop the app and proper way to contact us is via support email. We can also give you live support if you have any questions. You can also send us feature requests.

• Removed "File is already open" notification. Now it will change to the already opened file in tabs.
• Fixed issue when using external keyboard CMD+number could change to wrong tab in rare cases.

• Removed custom Vim mode key from settings, where you could only bind one character. Now you should use the predefined keys/bindings.
Supported Vim mode keys:
Software keyboard: Esc
External keyboard: Esc, Ctrl+c, Ctrl+[ and (CTRL+ALT+8 and 9)

• SFTP and SSH now supports OpenSSH RSA, ed25519 and ECDSA key formats.
• You can now use any name for your private key.
